text: When it existed, the Soviet Union had a national anthem and regional anthems for each of its republics. ==List== Region Title Started being used Stopped being used Replaced with "Anthem of the Armenian Soviet Socialist Republic" 1944 1991 "Mer Hayrenik" "Anthem of the Azerbaijan Soviet Socialist Republic" 1944 1992 "Azərbaycan marşı" "Anthem of the Byelorussian Soviet Socialist Republic" 1952 1991 "My Belarusy" "My Checheno-Ingushetia" 1957 1991 "Anthem of the Chechen Republic of Ichkeria" (current anthem: "Shatlak's Song") "Anthem of the Chechen Republic of Ichkeria" "Qızıl Asker Marşı" 1934 1945 "Hymn of Crimea" (since 2000) "Anthem of the Estonian Soviet Socialist Republic" 1945 1990 "Mu isamaa, mu õnn ja rõõm" "Anthem of the Georgian Soviet Socialist Republic" 1946 1990 "Dideba" "Dideba" 1990 1991 "Tavisupleba" "Anthem of the Karelo- Finnish Soviet Socialist Republic" 1945 1956 N/A (demoted to ASSR) "Anthem of the Republic of Karelia" "Anthem of the Kazakh Soviet Socialist Republic" 1945 1992 "Anthem of the Republic of Kazakhstan" (current anthem: "Menıñ Qazaqstanym") "Anthem of the Kirghiz Soviet Socialist Republic" 1946 1992 "National Anthem of the Kyrgyz Republic" "Anthem of the Latvian Soviet Socialist Republic" 1945 1990 "Dievs, svētī Latviju!" "Anthem of the Lithuanian Soviet Socialist Republic" 1950 1988 "Tautiška giesmė" "Anthem of the Moldavian Soviet Socialist Republic" 1945 1991 "Deșteaptă-te, române!" (current anthem: "Limba noastră") "Patrioticheskaya Pesnya" 1990 1991 "State Anthem of the Russian Federation" "Anthem of the Tajik Soviet Socialist Republic" 1946 1994 "Surudi Milli" "Anthem of the Turkmen Soviet Socialist Republic" 1946 1996 "State Anthem of Turkmenistan" "Tuvan Internationale" 1921 1944 "Tooruktug Dolgay Tangdym" "Tooruktug Dolgay Tangdym" 1944 2011 "Men – Tyva Men" "Anthem of the Ukrainian Soviet Socialist Republic" 1949 1992 "State Anthem of Ukraine" "Anthem of the Uzbek Soviet Socialist Republic" 1947 1992 "State Anthem of Uzbekistan" ==References== ===Notes=== Soviet Union
title: Anthems of the Soviet Republics
